-	shop	时装头中#01	-1,31167:-1,31168:-1,50009:-1,50034:-1,50042:-1,50093:-1,50095:-1,50114:-1,50118:-1,50123:-1,50130:-1,50133:-1,50141:-1,50171:-1,50198:-1,50201:-1,50204:-1,50212:-1,50213:-1,50214:-1,50219:-1,50252:-1,50268:-1;

-	shop	时装头下#01	-1,31162:-1,31164:-1,50006:-1,50010:-1,50018:-1,50023:-1,50024:-1,50025:-1,50031:-1,50039:-1,50041:-1,50046:-1,50065:-1,50104:-1,50111:-1,50117:-1,50165:-1,50173:-1,50175:-1,50218:-1,50241:-1,50242:-1,50243:-1,50244:-1,50248:-1,50271:-1,50274:-1;

-	shop	时装头下#02	-1,40006:-1,40007:-1,40008:-1,40009:-1,40010:-1,40011:-1,40012:-1,40013:-1,40014:-1,40015:-1,40016:-1,40017:-1,40018:-1,40029:-1,40030:-1,40031:-1,40032:-1,40033:-1,40034:-1,40035:-1,40036:-1,40037:-1,40038:-1,40039:-1,40040:-1,40041:-1,40042:-1,40043:-1,40044:-1,40045:-1,40046:-1,40073:-1,40074:-1,40075:-1,40076:-1,40077:-1,40078:-1,40079:-1,40080:-1;

-	shop	时装头下#03	-1,40081:-1,40082:-1,40083:-1,40084:-1,40085:-1,40086:-1,40087:-1,40088:-1,40089:-1,40090:-1,40091:-1,40092:-1,40093:-1,40103:-1,40104:-1,40105:-1,40106:-1,40107:-1,40108:-1,40181:-1,40182:-1,40183:-1,40184:-1,40185:-1,40186:-1,40187:-1,40188:-1,40189:-1,40190:-1,40191:-1,40192:-1,40193:-1;

-	shop	时装披肩#01	-1,40201:-1,40202:-1,40203:-1,40204:-1,40205:-1,40206:-1,40208:-1,40209:-1,40210:-1,40211:-1,40212:-1,40213:-1,40214:-1,40216:-1,40217:-1,40218:-1,40219:-1,40220:-1,40221:-1,40222:-1,40223:-1,40224:-1;

prontera,140,125,5	script	时装制作	716,{
	switch(select("时装头上","时装头中","时装头下","时装披肩")) {
	    case 1:	callfunc "时装头上";	break;
	    case 2:	callfunc "时装头中";	break;
	    case 3:	callfunc "时装头下";	break;
	    case 4:	callfunc "时装披肩";	break;
	}

OnInit:
    waitingroom "[☆时装制作☆]",0;
    end;
}

function	script	时装头上	{
 	switch(select("A系列","B系列","C系列","D系列")) {
 	    case 1:	callshop "时装头上#01",1;	break;
    	case 2:	callshop "时装头上#02",1;	break;
    	case 3:	callshop "时装头上#03",1;	break;
    	case 4:	callshop "时装头上#04",1;	break;
 	}
}

function	script	时装头中	{
 	switch(select("A系列","B系列")) {
 	    case 1:	callshop "时装头中#01",1;	break;
    	case 2:	callshop "时装头中#02",1;	break;
 	}
}

function	script	时装头下	{
 	switch(select("A系列","B系列","C系列")) {
 	    case 1:	callshop "时装头下#01",1;	break;
    	case 2:	callshop "时装头下#02",1;	break;
    	case 3:	callshop "时装头下#03",1;	break;
 	}
}

function	script	时装披肩	{
 	switch(select("A系列")) {
 	    case 1:	callshop "时装披肩#01",1;	break;
 	}
}
